QuestData.Title: The Critical Path
QuestData.Description: The auburn forests of Talador sit at a critical crossroads of this continent, commander. The Iron Horde's fleet is already en route from Gorgrond to Shattrath on the west coast.$B$BTalador will fall if we don't reinforce them. I took the liberty of dispatching Foreman Eksos, who has already begun construction on an outpost for your forces not far from the Iron Horde landing point. He awaits your orders sir.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Dungar Longdrink to secure a flight to Talador.
